data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Hatay access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hatay, Turkey
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Hatay to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2665 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Hatay to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 2,665 neighbors who are far from you in Hatay. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Karachai people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,503,100 people living in Hatay.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Hatay words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Hatay, Turkey that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

location.name: Hatay
location.people_groups_list: Alawite, Adyghe, Kurd, Kurmanji, Abaza, Herki
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Alawite (554,000), Adyghe (350,000), Kurd, Kurmanji (2,200), Abaza (14,000), Herki (43,000)
